headline: JPMorgan Raises Price Target on Globe Life Inc. (GL) to $181 and Reiterates an Overweight Rating
summary: Globe Life Inc. (NYSE:GL) is included among the 10 Most Profitable Undervalued Stocks to Buy On February 6, 2026, JPMorgan analyst Jimmy Bhullar raised his price target on Globe Life Inc. (NYSE:GL) to $181 from $180 and reiterated an Overweight rating. The modest adjustment followed the company’s latest earnings update and the company’s fiscal 2026 earnings […]
